Title: Relates to the additional member contributions required of certain EMTs in the twenty-five year retirement program
Summary: Places limits on the additional member contributions required of certain EMTs in the twenty-five year retirement program.
LawCode: Amd ยง604-e, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the additional member contributions required of certain EMTs in the twenty-five year retirement program
